text: The Cité de l'espace is a museum in Toulouse, France. It is dedicated to space exploration. The Cité de l'espace offers visitors to discover the Ariane 5 rocket (53 meters high), the Soyuz spacecraft and a earth observation satellite. You can also visit the Mir space station with all its equipment. Almost 5 million visitors have visited it in its 20 years of existence. Category:1997 establishments in France Category:Museums in France Category:Outer space Category:Toulouse
title: Cité de l'espace
